sc.server.gaming

Class GameRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • sc.server.gaming.GameRoom

  • public class GameRoom
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper for an actual GameInstance. GameInstances are provided by the plugins. Additional mapping data (Client2Player) will be stored here.
